mapper.sql: id, parent_id AS parentId, name, type, icon, title, level, order, create_user_id AS createUserId, create_time AS createTime, update_user_id AS updateUserId, update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT * from ( SELECT m.id,m.parent_id,m.name,m.icon,m.level,m.title,m.type,m.order FROM sys_permission m, sys_role_permission rm, sys_user_role ur WHERE m.id = rm.permission_id AND rm.role_id = ur.role_id AND ur.user_id = #{value} GROUP BY m.id HAVING m.type <> '2' UNION SELECT sm.id,sm.parent_id,sm.name,sm.icon,sm.level,sm.title,sm.type,sm.order FROM sys_permission m, sys_role_permission rm, sys_user_role ur, sys_permission sm WHERE m.id = rm.permission_id AND rm.role_id = ur.role_id AND m.parent_id = sm.id AND ur.user_id = #{value} GROUP BY sm.id HAVING sm.type <> '2' UNION SELECT sm.id,sm.parent_id,sm.name,sm.icon,sm.level,sm.title,sm.type,sm.order FROM sys_permission m, sys_role_permission rm, sys_user_role ur, sys_permission psm, sys_permission sm WHERE m.id = rm.permission_id AND rm.role_id = ur.role_id AND m.parent_id = psm.id AND psm.parent_id = sm.id AND ur.user_id = #{value} GROUP BY sm.id HAVING sm.type <> '2' ) a ORDER BY `order`,level

SELECT m.name FROM sys_permission m, sys_role_permission rm, sys_user_role ur WHERE m.id = rm.permission_id AND rm.role_id = ur.role_id AND ur.user_id = #{value} GROUP BY m.id UNION SELECT sm.name FROM sys_permission m, sys_role_permission rm, sys_user_role ur, sys_permission sm WHERE m.id = rm.permission_id AND rm.role_id = ur.role_id AND m.parent_id = sm.id AND ur.user_id = #{value} GROUP BY sm.id UNION SELECT sm.name FROM sys_permission m, sys_role_permission rm, sys_user_role ur, sys_permission psm, sys_permission sm WHERE m.id = rm.permission_id AND rm.role_id = ur.role_id AND m.parent_id = psm.id AND psm.parent_id = sm.id AND ur.user_id = #{value} GROUP BY sm.id
